item.title: AI Washing and the White-Collar Transformation: What History Teaches Us
item.description: Block's layoffs sparked 'AI is taking jobs' panic. But the reality is more nuanced: executives are using AI as cover for restructuring while experimenting with new operating models. History suggests competition, not mass unemployment, is what's coming.
